pages.text: The $(thing)Solarbloom Flower$() is a rare and powerful magical plant that harnesses and concentrates the energy of the sun itself.$(br2)With radiant golden petals that seem to glow from within, this remarkable bloom stores solar energy and can release it in concentrated bursts.

$(bold)Cultivation Notes:$()$(br)- Must be planted on Grove Soil infused with Flame Essence$(br)- Requires direct sunlight to grow$(br)- Will not grow properly in shade or underground$(br)- When mature, emits light and grants temporary fire resistance to nearby entities

pages.title: Essence Crafting
pages.text: Solarbloom Essence combines the heat of fire with the movement of air. This crafting method produces essences using a Gust bloom surrounded by Flame essences.

pages.title: Bloom Properties
pages.text: Harvested Solarbloom blooms continue to radiate light and warmth. Unlike Flame Flowers which produce destructive heat, Solarbloom creates cleansing, purifying light that can be used for more refined magical applications.

pages.title: Advanced Applications
pages.text: $(li)Creating permanent magical light sources$(li)Purification rituals to cleanse corrupted materials$(li)Enhanced growing environments for other magical plants$(li)Solar-powered magical devices that work continuously$(li)Protection against darkness-based magic and entities$(br2)$(italic)Due to its rarity and power, handle Solarbloom with appropriate caution and respect.$()
